name: hexadecimal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or expressed in a system of counting based on the number 16 rather than the number 10: Web browsers recognize hexadecimal numbers. Some applications store information in the registry in hexadecimal format.
More examplesFewer examplesRTF can handle bitmap images encoded in either a hexadecimal or binary format.You must use EVAL to convert hexadecimal number strings.This is a 16-digit hexadecimal representation of an 8-byte token.

a system of counting based on the number 16 rather than the number 10: The values are most meaningfully expressed in hexadecimal.
More examplesFewer examplesBinary may be converted to and from hexadecimal.The computer program was written in hexadecimal.Hexadecimal is a positional numeral system with a radix, or base, of 16.
